analyzed: rab tu brjid pa'i mgon po stag lpags sham thabs can //

analyzed: spyi gtsug 'khor lo nor bu snyan cha gdub kor dang // mgur chu phyag rgya sku regs thal bas rab tu brgyan //

analyzed: lha yi gdugs dkar mdzes pa steng na 'dzin pa'i dpal //

analyzed: 'jigs byed dus mtshan ma rungs skrag cing gtsigs pa'i zhal //

analyzed: 'gro ba'i gtso bo thams cad 'jigs dang gus mchod pa'i //

original: rgyal chen he ru ka dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
analyzed: rgyal chen he ru ka dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//

analyzed: h'um dbus phyogs rnam dag rdo rje'i zhing gi dkyil 'khor na //

analyzed: shar phyogs rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing gi dkyil 'khor na ;

analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku //

analyzed: 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs //

analyzed: gcer mo g-yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //

analyzed: ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i gti mug 'joms//
translated: You, Mother who pervades the sky, destroy the delusion of beings.

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par 'jug / ye shes chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan 'char ba mo //

analyzed: bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun phyogs rnams rdul du rlog / lam log 'gro ba bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing //

analyzed: dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //

analyzed: byang phyogs rnam dag las mchog zhing gi dkyil 'khor na //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma las kyi rigs kyi gtso mo ni //

analyzed: 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs //

analyzed: phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho gzhon pa sgeg pa'i sku //

analyzed: ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i phrag dog 'joms //
